text:
When a particularly backend URL is reverse proxied into the server two or more times, the following spurious warning is given:

[Fri Mar 19 13:52:59 2010] [warn] worker [URL] already used by another worker

As it is entirely valid to expose a backend server more than once in an URL space, this log statement should be reset to debug level.
creator: minfrin@sharp.fm

text:
Patch applied to trunk, proposed for backport:

http://people.apache.org/~minfrin/httpd-proxy-worker-already-used.patch
creator: minfrin@sharp.fm
rainer.jung@kippdata.de
